replies.msg:
呢幾個月發夢行街唱歌仔多到一個點, 決定比自己出走休息下
度下度下決定坐UO飛羽田五日
不過東京市內去得多
今次決定去下日光輕井澤等等行下
個trip會有live update, 有興趣賞個面可以睇下
(小弟文筆差, 如有1999歡迎大大力插)

其實呢, 小弟今晚飛
依家就快快手返屋企執葉執行李先
去開日本既巴絲可能已經知我坐咩機
同機既可以相認下
(不過小弟肥宅一個, 應該會嚇死相認巴絲)
會去邊到就去 可以留tg傾下
想問機票酒店大約幾錢？

I took the JLPT at N one level in Tokyo the other week. My writing far outshines my speaking so the marks I lost in speaking were offset by those I gained in writing. My friend any top took the test. She's a little weak in speaking but strong on listening so the marks she gained in the listening part offset those she lost in the speaking section. After the test we spent money on clothes and shoes like it was going out of fashion. We entered a casino and gambled like it was going out of fashion. If you enjoy being in Japan you might spend money on food and cosmetic products like it's going out of fashion. If you go to the casino you might gamble like it's going out of fashion like we did lol

replies.msg: JLPT doesn’t test for speaking proficiency...
